column1: Uchi////I thought Uchi was pretty good. Most of their food was unique and not found in other Sushi places. If you are looking for Sashimi
column2: I felt their price was substantially higher than most and possible not worth eating there. If you are into Chef's recommendation
column4: etc. this is the place to go. Keep in mind I went there during Happy Hour
column5: 5-6:30pm and their prices are 1/2 off. I would probably return during those times as I think that's a good value ratio for what you get.
